ViewObject.Name: DirectSpvLov
ViewObject.SQLQuery: SELECT FULL_NAME, DESCR, USER_NAME, SRC_TEXT FROM ( SELECT AppUserAccess.FULL_NAME, AppUserAccess.USER_NAME, ApprovalSteps.ROLE_NAME, ApprovalSteps.STEP_SEQUENCE, AppRoles.DESCR, (AppUserAccess.FULL_NAME || ' ' || AppUserAccess.USER_NAME || ' ' || AppRoles.DESCR) AS SRC_TEXT FROM APP_USER_ACCESS AppUserAccess, APP_USER_ACCESS_ROLES AppUserAccessRoles, APPROVAL_FLOW ApprovalFlow, APPROVAL_STEPS ApprovalSteps, APP_ROLES AppRoles WHERE AppUserAccess.COMPANY_ID = :compId AND AppUserAccessRoles.USER_NAME = AppUserAccess.USER_NAME AND ApprovalFlow.APRVL_FLOW_NM = 'PROPOSAL FOOD' AND ApprovalSteps.ID_APRVL_FLOW = ApprovalFlow.ID_APRVL_FLOW AND AppUserAccessRoles.ROLE = ApprovalSteps.ROLE_NAME AND AppRoles.NAME = AppUserAccessRoles.ROLE AND ApprovalSteps.STEP_SEQUENCE > (SELECT ASTEP.STEP_SEQUENCE FROM APPROVAL_FLOW AFLOW, APPROVAL_STEPS ASTEP, APP_USER_ACCESS_ROLES UAR WHERE AFLOW.APRVL_FLOW_NM = ApprovalFlow.APRVL_FLOW_NM AND ASTEP.ID_APRVL_FLOW = AFLOW.ID_APRVL_FLOW AND ASTEP.ROLE_NAME = UAR.ROLE AND UAR.USER_NAME = :usrName) UNION ALL SELECT AppUserAccess.FULL_NAME, AppUserAccess.USER_NAME, ApprovalSteps.ROLE_NAME, ApprovalSteps.STEP_SEQUENCE, AppRoles.DESCR, (AppUserAccess.FULL_NAME || ' ' || AppUserAccess.USER_NAME || ' ' || AppRoles.DESCR) AS SRC_TEXT FROM APP_USER_ACCESS AppUserAccess, APP_USER_ACCESS_ROLES AppUserAccessRoles, APPROVAL_FLOW ApprovalFlow, APPROVAL_STEPS ApprovalSteps, APP_ROLES AppRoles WHERE AppUserAccess.COMPANY_ID = :compId AND AppUserAccessRoles.USER_NAME = AppUserAccess.USER_NAME AND ApprovalFlow.APRVL_FLOW_NM = 'PROPOSAL NON FOOD' AND ApprovalSteps.ID_APRVL_FLOW = ApprovalFlow.ID_APRVL_FLOW AND AppUserAccessRoles.ROLE = ApprovalSteps.ROLE_NAME AND AppRoles.NAME = AppUserAccessRoles.ROLE AND ApprovalSteps.STEP_SEQUENCE > (SELECT ASTEP.STEP_SEQUENCE FROM APPROVAL_FLOW AFLOW, APPROVAL_STEPS ASTEP, APP_USER_ACCESS_ROLES UAR WHERE AFLOW.APRVL_FLOW_NM = ApprovalFlow.APRVL_FLOW_NM AND ASTEP.ID_APRVL_FLOW = AFLOW.ID_APRVL_FLOW AND ASTEP.ROLE_NAME = UAR.ROLE AND UAR.USER_NAME = :usrName) UNION ALL SELECT AppUserAccess.FULL_NAME, AppUserAccess.USER_NAME, ApprovalSteps.ROLE_NAME, ApprovalSteps.STEP_SEQUENCE, AppRoles.DESCR, (AppUserAccess.FULL_NAME || ' ' || AppUserAccess.USER_NAME || ' ' || AppRoles.DESCR) AS SRC_TEXT FROM APP_USER_ACCESS AppUserAccess, APP_USER_ACCESS_ROLES AppUserAccessRoles, APPROVAL_FLOW ApprovalFlow, APPROVAL_STEPS ApprovalSteps, APP_ROLES AppRoles WHERE AppUserAccess.COMPANY_ID = :compId AND AppUserAccessRoles.USER_NAME = AppUserAccess.USER_NAME AND ApprovalFlow.APRVL_FLOW_NM = 'PROPOSAL FOOD HO' AND ApprovalSteps.ID_APRVL_FLOW = ApprovalFlow.ID_APRVL_FLOW AND AppUserAccessRoles.ROLE = ApprovalSteps.ROLE_NAME AND AppRoles.NAME = AppUserAccessRoles.ROLE AND ApprovalSteps.STEP_SEQUENCE > (SELECT ASTEP.STEP_SEQUENCE FROM APPROVAL_FLOW AFLOW, APPROVAL_STEPS ASTEP, APP_USER_ACCESS_ROLES UAR WHERE AFLOW.APRVL_FLOW_NM = ApprovalFlow.APRVL_FLOW_NM AND ASTEP.ID_APRVL_FLOW = AFLOW.ID_APRVL_FLOW AND ASTEP.ROLE_NAME = UAR.ROLE AND UAR.USER_NAME = :usrName) UNION ALL SELECT AppUserAccess.FULL_NAME, AppUserAccess.USER_NAME, ApprovalSteps.ROLE_NAME, ApprovalSteps.STEP_SEQUENCE, AppRoles.DESCR, (AppUserAccess.FULL_NAME || ' ' || AppUserAccess.USER_NAME || ' ' || AppRoles.DESCR) AS SRC_TEXT FROM APP_USER_ACCESS AppUserAccess, APP_USER_ACCESS_ROLES AppUserAccessRoles, APPROVAL_FLOW ApprovalFlow, APPROVAL_STEPS ApprovalSteps, APP_ROLES AppRoles WHERE AppUserAccess.COMPANY_ID = :compId AND AppUserAccessRoles.USER_NAME = AppUserAccess.USER_NAME AND ApprovalFlow.APRVL_FLOW_NM = 'PROPOSAL NON FOOD HO' AND ApprovalSteps.ID_APRVL_FLOW = ApprovalFlow.ID_APRVL_FLOW AND AppUserAccessRoles.ROLE = ApprovalSteps.ROLE_NAME AND AppRoles.NAME = AppUserAccessRoles.ROLE AND ApprovalSteps.STEP_SEQUENCE > (SELECT ASTEP.STEP_SEQUENCE FROM APPROVAL_FLOW AFLOW, APPROVAL_STEPS ASTEP, APP_USER_ACCESS_ROLES UAR WHERE AFLOW.APRVL_FLOW_NM = ApprovalFlow.APRVL_FLOW_NM AND ASTEP.ID_APRVL_FLOW = AFLOW.ID_APRVL_FLOW AND ASTEP.ROLE_NAME = UAR.ROLE AND UAR.USER_NAME = :usrName)) GROUP BY FULL_NAME, DESCR, USER_NAME, SRC_TEXT
